Text.Page:
The Enlightened Union's researchers have discovered what may be an interesting property of nocteniumâ€”and we would like you, my friend, to help confirm our hypothesis.

Plants in areas with high concentrations of noctenium do not seem to either grow or wither. This may be due to trace amounts of noctenium in the soil where the plants grow.

Please gather at least three contaminated seeds for us so that we can ascertain if this is the actual cause.

Well done, friend! The specimens you returned are ideal.
The union's researchers will be quite pleased to have these.
The Enlightened Union will rise to the top!
